eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Adams; Arapahoe; Boulder; Broomfield; Denver; Douglas; Jefferson, CO; AT 05:08 AM ON SEP 23, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 08:08 AM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: This is the Colorado Bureau of Investigation with and AMBER Child Abduction Alert. We have received this important announcement regarding an abducted Child from Boulder. The Boulder Police Department is searching for 16-year-old Jasmin Zapata last seen in Boulder at about eight o clock yesterday evening. Jasmin is described as a hispanic, female, with brown eyes and black hair, five feet and five inches tall, and weighing one hundred and ten pounds. Jasmin was last seen wearing a black shirt and black pants. Investigators believe Jasmin may have been taken by force by nineteen year old, hispanic, male, Juan Bretado  and another unknown male and may be traveling in a two door grey Chevy Silverado bearing Colorado license plate A, W, X, L, 5, 2 that was last seen at Thornton Parkway and Gale Boulevard in Thornton at eight fifty seven yesterday evening. The truck has a lime green Timpano sticker in the bottom left rear windshield. If you have any information regarding this abduction, immediately call 9 1  1.
